formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'MusicOnHold' =-
[Synopsis] Play Music On Hold indefinitely
[Description] MusicOnHold(class): Plays hold music specified by class. If omitted, the default music source for the channel will be used. Set the default class with the SetMusicOnHold() application. Returns -1 on hangup. Never returns otherwise.
